subject: Hate Crimes
Plea Bargaining
Holocaust and the Nazi Era
Baseball
Anti-Semitism
Sentences (Criminal)
lead_paragraph: Delmon Young, formerly of the Detroit Tigers, accepted a plea deal on charges of aggravated harassment in New York, and was ordered to attend a half-day program at the Museum of Tolerance.
snippet: Delmon Young, formerly of the Detroit Tigers, accepted a plea deal on charges of aggravated harassment in New York, and was ordered to attend a half-day program at the Museum of Tolerance.
